cause.description:
To educate everyone about spina bifida and that NOT everybody that has spina bifida is or will be in a wheel chair.Spina bifida comes in so many levels.For the people living with spina bifida,some of their days can be painful and uncomfortable.
1. Raise awareness of spina bifida.
2. Back surgery is a possible option to better the one living with spina bifida and can give them more freedom in life.
3. It is possible to still walk and have spina bifida,lets educate the world,one step at a time.
cause.mission: To support those living with Spina bifida
cause.name: Spina bifida Awareness
